RTCInboundRtpStreamStatsPacketsFailedDec.summary:
The packetsFailedDecryption
property of the dictionary indicates the total
number of RTP packets which failed to be decrypted successfully after
being received by the local end of the connection during this session.

remarks.para: -{{RFC(3711, "", "3.3")}}: Description of the decryption process for secure RTP packets

RTCInboundRtpStreamStatsPacketsFailedDec.value:
An integer value which indicates how many packets the local end of the RTP connection
could not be successfully decrypted.
